# Large Language Models Crawling Policy

# Allow
https://avakata.agency/
https://avakata.agency/sitemap.xml
https://avakata.agency/blog/
https://avakata.agency/blog/*
https://avakata.agency/projects/
https://avakata.agency/projects/*
https://avakata.agency/services/
https://avakata.agency/services/*

# Disallow (private or non-content endpoints)
https://avakata.agency/api/*
https://avakata.agency/admin/*

# Notes
- This file is intended for LLM and AI crawlers to find canonical content.
- Prefer the sitemap for discovery. If you index individual pages, ensure canonical tags are respected.
